text: Michael John McKean (born October 17, 1947) is an American actor, comedian, screenwriter, and musician. He played Lenny Kosnowski in Laverne & Shirley, David St. Hubbins in This Is Spinal Tap, and Chuck McGill on Better Call Saul. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television writers Category:American television directors Category:American composers Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Actors from New York City
title: Michael McKean
